ygData.subject: Re: Hrmmm..
ygData.msgSnippet: The Bind affinity only works if you are in a group with that person, and if you are grouping with people that would pull that kind of stunt, you should re
ygData.messageBody:
The Bind affinity only works if you are in a group with that person, and if
you are grouping with people that would pull that kind of stunt, you should
re think your grouping priorities.

About the pet trick, that is true. Good way to banish the pet of a PC
Nevromancer, but it is a real cheap trick.

-----Original Message-----
From: John S. Cuculic [SMTP:jcuculic@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 6:06 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Re: Hrmmm..

From: "John S. Cuculic" <jcuculic@...>

Enigma wrote:
> >From: Enigma <enigma@...>
>
> Ummm K not even close, there are a bunch of exploits in the game. I
personally watch to see what some SOB is going to do to me next.
>

Speaking of what some SOB could do to you:

Someone could "bind affinity" to you where you would get killed after
getting killed.

If you have a pet and someone makes you invisible, the pet goes away.
